mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.title, r.description, r.code, r.language, r.created_at, r.updated_at, i.id as img_id, i.name as img_name, i.image_data as img_image_data, i.file_size as img_file_size, i.content_type as img_content_type, i.created_at as img_created_at, i.record_id as img_record_id FROM gallery_records r LEFT JOIN gallery_images i ON r.id = i.record_id ORDER BY r.created_at DESC, i.created_at ASC

SELECT r.id, r.title, r.description, r.code, r.language, r.created_at, r.updated_at, i.id as img_id, i.name as img_name, i.image_data as img_image_data, i.file_size as img_file_size, i.content_type as img_content_type, i.created_at as img_created_at, i.record_id as img_record_id FROM gallery_records r LEFT JOIN gallery_images i ON r.id = i.record_id WHERE r.id = #{id} ORDER BY i.created_at ASC

SELECT r.id, r.title, r.description, r.code, r.language, r.created_at, r.updated_at, i.id as img_id, i.name as img_name, i.image_data as img_image_data, i.file_size as img_file_size, i.content_type as img_content_type, i.created_at as img_created_at, i.record_id as img_record_id FROM gallery_records r LEFT JOIN gallery_images i ON r.id = i.record_id WHERE r.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY r.created_at DESC, i.created_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallery_records (title, description, code, language, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{code}, #{language}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE gallery_records SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, code = #{code}, language = #{language}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
